6.name: Silicon valley
6.plot: Richard, a programmer, creates an app called the Pied Piper and tries to get investors for it. Meanwhile,five other programmers struggle to make their mark in Silicon Valley.

7.name: Mr Robot
7.plot: Elliot, a programmer, takes down E-Corp.

8.name: Twin Peak
8.plot: Agent Cooper, an FBI Agent, discovers the mysteries surrounding the town of Twin Peaks.
